naslov: Villa Oberon, Wellness, Pool, 4bedrooms, Istra, Buzet (prodaja)
opis: Villa Tipaz Oberon, Luxury villa 561m2 We have the honor to present to you the Istria Project, where we continue to expand our vision into custom villas. The Istria project includes two luxury and futuristic villas , located in the heart of Istria, near Buzet. Villas are located in the quiet Istrian village Pracana, near Sovinjak, which makes them perfect for escaping from routine and quiet vacation with a touch of luxury in nature. Each villa is an independent residential unit with outdoor swimming pools, and beautiful nature. Surfaces floors contain: main building 372 sq mt balconies and terraces 154 sq mt pool 31 sq mt barbecue 4 sq mt in total: 561sq mt Villa Oberon contains 4 bedrooms , 6 bathrooms, open concept living room, dining room and kitchen, gym, wine  cellar, outdoor barbecue/kitchen area, office, wellness.
